entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is worried about attending his first funeral and dealing with the loss of Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A teacher and headmaster at Hogwarts who has passed away. Harry is concerned about attending his funeral.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's godfather who had died previously. His death is mentioned as a contrast to Dumbledore's.

relationships.description: Harry is worried about attending Dumbledore's funeral and dealing with his loss.
Dumbledore's death is contrasted to Sirius' death, which Harry had experienced previously.
